backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining user profiles, habits, records, monthly targets, and access‑controlled CRUD operations for habit tracking.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of all major frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app flow handling authentication, profile loading, error states, and routing to dashboard or setup screens.
frontend/src/components/CollapsibleHabit: UI panel that toggles visibility of the HabitManager inside a collapsible container.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary component that catches rendering errors and displays a custom fallback.
frontend/src/components/FatalErrorFallba: Fallback UI shown on fatal errors with reload and retry options.
frontend/src/components/HabitGrid.tsx: Renders a calendar grid for habits, mapping records by day and allowing completion toggles and amount editing.
frontend/src/components/HabitManager.tsx: Provides UI to create, edit, and delete habits with validation for units, weekly targets, and default amounts.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with the app title, user greeting, and logout menu.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Shows the login UI using Internet Identity with branding and a login button.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyTargetsEd: Displays monthly target vs. progress for applicable habits using Steady Climb calculations.
frontend/src/components/MonthTabs.tsx: Renders month selector tabs with horizontal scrolling and clamps month changes to 1–12.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form to create a user profile by entering a name and saving it via mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProgressCharts.t: Generates monthly progress visuals including a pie chart, per‑habit bars, and daily trend chart.
frontend/src/components/TrackerDashboard: Main dashboard component that loads habits and records, manages month selection, and renders grids, charts, and editors.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and loading stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating habits, records, and user profiles through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Placeholder TypeScript declaration file for jsPDF types.
frontend/src/utils/duration.ts: Parses free‑text durations to seconds, formats seconds to readable strings, and validates duration input.
frontend/src/utils/fileDownload.ts: Generates filenames for CSV or PDF exports using start and end date ranges.
frontend/src/utils/habitUnit.ts: Helpers for reading, converting, and creating HabitUnit types used for habit measurement units.
frontend/src/utils/reportCsv.ts: Generates a CSV export of habit records with headers, date range, user info, and habit/unit lookups, plus a download helper.
frontend/src/utils/reportDateRange.ts: Provides utilities to extract UTC date components, convert date ranges, and format dates to YYYY-MM-DD.
frontend/src/utils/reportPdf.ts: Empty placeholder file for PDF report utilities.
frontend/src/utils/reportStats.ts: Computes report statistics including habit completion, daily progress, and volume metrics across a date range.
frontend/src/utils/steadyClimbPlan.ts: Defines monthly steady‑climb fitness targets and helpers to retrieve targets per month or per habit.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the steady‑climb monthly target feature, requirements, and state.
